text: Chara Dimitriou (born 12 April 1990) is a Greek footballer who plays as a midfielder and has appeared for the Greece women's national team. ==Career== Dimitriou has been capped for the Greece national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Greek women's footballers Category:Greece women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders
title: Chara Dimitriou
